Theme Monos

Simple and lightweight theme for Jekyll

Features

  • Responsive.
  • Syntax Highlight

  • Offers category menu.

_config.yml

Code block will look like this.

highlighter-theme: monokai //you can change your syntax color scheme.
date_format: "%Y-%M-%D" //and date format.
